Package game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Game
  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Most of the game logic

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        @Deprecated
public Game​(int gameid,
            java.lang.String gameName,
            BattleshipUser hostUser)
        Deprecated.

      • Game

        public Game​(int gameid,
            java.lang.String gameName,
            BattleshipUser hostUser,
            boolean hosting)
        constructs new game either when user hosts or joins game
        Parameters:
        gameid - used as PK in database to identify game. Hosting game and joining game have the same gameid.
        gameName - name of the game
        hostUser - the user hosting the game
        hosting - signalizes whether the local user is hosting the game or not.

    • Method Detail

      • getBoard1

        public Board getBoard1()
        helper method for unit testing
        Returns:
        the local user's board

      • getBoard2

        public Board getBoard2()
        helper method for unit testing
        Returns:
        the opponent user's board

      • getActionCache

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getActionCache()
        helper method for unit testing
        Returns:
        list of actions in the cache queued for database upload

      • getGameId

        public int getGameId()
        Returns:
        used as PK in database to identify game. Hosting game and joining game have the same gameid.

      • getGameName

        public java.lang.String getGameName()
        Returns:
        used to identify a game to the user in the games table. also appears in-game at the top.

      • isHosting

        public boolean isHosting()
        Returns:
        true if the local user is hosting, false otherwise.

      • getHostUser

        public BattleshipUser getHostUser()
        Returns:
        the user hosting the game

      • getJoinUser

        public BattleshipUser getJoinUser()
        Returns:
        the user that joined the game

      • setJoinUser

        public void setJoinUser​(BattleshipUser newUser)
        sets a new user to JoinUser
        Parameters:
        newUser - user to be set as joinUser

      • doAction

        public void doAction​(java.lang.String coordinates)
        executes an attack action on the opponent's board
        Parameters:
        coordinates - xx,yy for where on the 10x10 board to attack

      • addCachedAction

        public void addCachedAction​(java.lang.String coords)
        adds an attack action to a cache
        Parameters:
        coords - xx,yy for where on the 10x10 board to attack

      • doCachedActions

        public void doCachedActions()
        sends all queued actions sequentially to be executed in doAction()

      • addUploadAction

        public void addUploadAction​(java.lang.String coords)
        adds attack to upload cache
        Parameters:
        coords - string cordinates on the form xx,yy

      • uploadCachedActions

        public void uploadCachedActions​(java.lang.String remove,
                                int status)
        uploads cached actions to database
        Parameters:
        remove - the coords-string the previous uploadCachedActions got interrupted trying to remove from uploadActionCache
        status - how far it got into the previous uploadCachedActions method before getting interrupted by another thread

      • uploadCachedActions

        public void uploadCachedActions()
        tries to upload cached actions to the database

      • incMoveID

        public void incMoveID()
        increments moveId by one

      • isMyTurn

        public boolean isMyTurn()
        Returns:
        true if the local user has the turn, false otherwise

      • setMyTurn

        public void setMyTurn​(boolean myTurn)
        sets myTurn
        Parameters:
        myTurn - true for turn to be passed to the local user, false for turn to be passed to opponent

      • allActionsUploaded

        public boolean allActionsUploaded()
        checks if all actions are uploaded to database
        Returns:
        true if all actions are uploaded, false otherwise

      • isGameOver

        public boolean isGameOver()
        checks if game is over
        Returns:
        true if game is over, otherwise false

      • setGameOver

        public void setGameOver​(boolean gameOver)
        Sets gameOver
        Parameters:
        gameOver - true if the game is over, false if the game is not over

      • getMoveId

        public int getMoveId()
        Returns:
        the id of the current move being executed

      • getGameResult

        public int getGameResult()
        checks who won the game, used at the end of the game
        Returns:
        1 for local user winning, 0 for local user losing, -1 for fuck up/game not ended

      • setBoards

        public void setBoards​(Board board1,
                      Board board2)
        gives the game two boards to play on
        Parameters:
        board1 - the local user's board
        board2 - the opponent user's board

      • isGameOpen

        public boolean isGameOpen()
        checks if game is joinable
        Returns:
        true if the game is joinable, false otherwise

      • setGameOpen

        public void setGameOpen​(boolean gameOpen)
        sets game to open, used for whenever it is waiting for user to join
        Parameters:
        gameOpen - true if the game is joinable, false otherwise

      • setBoardsReady

        public void setBoardsReady​(boolean boardsReady)
        setter method for boardsReady object variable
        Parameters:
        boardsReady - true if both boards are uploaded to database after both players have pressed 'ready'

      • isBoardsReady

        public boolean isBoardsReady()
        checks if both boards are initialized and both players have pressed 'ready'.
        Returns:
        true if both are ready, false otherwise

      • isShipsMovable

        public boolean isShipsMovable()
        checks if ships are movable or not (should be movable before pressing the 'ready' button
        Returns:
        true if ships are movable, false otherwise

      • setShipsMovable

        public void setShipsMovable​(boolean shipsMovable)
        sets whether ships are movable or not
        Parameters:
        shipsMovable - true for ships movable, false otherwise

      • setLoser

        public void setLoser​(BattleshipUser loser)
        desides loser of a game
        Parameters:
        loser - user that lost the game

        public BattleshipUser getWinner()
